ruddy.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a ruddy face looks pink and healthy
ruddy.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: The fire cast a ruddy glow over the room.
ruddy.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: used to emphasize what you are saying, especially when you are annoyed with someone or something
ruddy.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: I wish that ruddy dog would stop barking!
